card.name: Preem, the Everything
card.text: Whenever you cast an Equipment spell you may pay X , where X is that spell's mana value, if you do create X 1/1 white Wolf creature tokens. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Zaero, the Void
card.text: {C}, Sacrifice a Permanent: You may cast an Aura from your hand with mana value X or less without paying its mana costs, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed Permanent's mana value. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Creal, the False Avatar
card.text: Whenever a lore counter is put on a permanent you control, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. Permanents with counters on them have vigilance.

card.name: Dreim, the Typhoon
card.text: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Creatures you control with counters on them have evolve. (Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than that creature, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

card.name: Eiren, the Stable
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Ganshaw, the Truth
card.text: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater becomes blocked, create a treasure token. {2}: Target creature you control must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Ill' Omen, the Spirit
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If you do, add {W}{B} and put it into your graveyard. If you don't reveal it, put it into your hand.

card.name: Maliun, the Smog
card.text: Enchant commander you control Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create X 1/1 white Wolf tokens, where X is that spells mana value. Attacking modified creatures you control get +1/+0 and have first strike. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Nine, the Many
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets a permanent you control, you may pay {C}{U}. If you do, Create an Absolvement. (It's an enchantment Aura with "Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each enchantment you control.") Attach it to target creature you control. Modified creatures you control have changeling. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications. This card is every creature type.)

card.name: Orthos, the Tempest
card.text: Enchant commander you control Modified creatures you control have prowess. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Seergost, the Flesh
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, you may create that many clue tokens instead. {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Triem, the Affliction
card.text: Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature, you may put a land from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. Do this only once each turn. Modified creatures have wither. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications. This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

card.name: Unis, the Undisturbed
card.text: If you would surveil, you may instead exile an instant card from your graveyard. When do you, copy that card. You may cast the copy this turn. Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, you may surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Whirl, the Fierce
card.text: Enchant commander you control Other creatures you control are Dragons in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

card.name: Nashd, Preem's Carver
Curse of Betrayal
card.text: Enchant player. If a nonland permanent card would be put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead. At the beginning of enchanted player's end step, put all cards exiled with Curse of Betrayal onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Trelin, the Everwake
card.text: Spells you cast have bargain. (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Whenever you a spell, if it was bargained, Add: {B}.

card.name: H, the Pure
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with power greater than its base power enters, you may exile a card from your hand, if you do draw two cards. Do this only once per turn. Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 for each card you own in exile.

card.name: Halberd, the Scorched
card.text: Enchant commander you control Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "Whenever enchanted creature attacks, exile the top two card of your library, you may play them for as long as they are exiled."

card.name: Nidn, the Counsil
card.text: [+2]: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type. [0]: Create a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with Changeling (This card is every creature type.) [-1]: Exile target multicolored permanent. Nidn, The Counsil can be your commander. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Vex, the Mind
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library at any time. You may play the top card of your library by tapping two untapped permanent in addition to paying its other costs. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Lorn, the Hunger
card.text: When Lorn, The Hunger enters the battlefield, exile the top X cards of your library, you may cast them for as long as they are exiled. Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, create a treasure token. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Wia, the True Avatar
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a lore counter from any number of permanents. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of lore counters removed this way. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Isul, the Fates
card.text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw an additional card. If you do, mill four cards. {B}: {T}, You may cast target instant card from your graveyard until end of turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.) Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Rein, the Stark
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, create two 2/2 white Wolf creature tokens. {T}: Add {R}. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Ulemus, the Lost
card.text: Whenever you put one or more counters on target permanent you control, you may cast a noncreature spell with mana value 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Urz, the First
card.text: At the beginning of your combat phase, up to three target artifacts you control become 4/4 artifact creatures. Artifact spells you control have evoke {2}. (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.) Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Angmar, the Bladed
card.text: When Angmar, The Bladed enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of permanents, then create that many treasure tokens. Whenever a player sacrifices a token, you add {B}. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Oloo, the United
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may remove two +1/+1 counters from target permanent you control. If you do, create two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens. {T}: Sacrifice a creature token, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the sacrificed token's power. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Balion, the Empty
card.text: If Balion, The Empty is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. Balion, The Empty is the chosen color.

card.name: Seer, the Timeless
card.text: If Seer, The Timeless is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. Seer, The Timeless is the chosen color. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Fal, the Alone
card.text: Prowess Instant and sorcery spells you cast have rebound. (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.) Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Titan, the Ageless
card.text: This spell cost {1} less for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. Attacking creatures you control that have power 4 or greater get +3/+3 until end of turn. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Reise, the Headcutter
card.text: This spell costs {2} less for each Equipment you control. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may attach any number of target Equipment you control to Reise. Choose an Aspect (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.) (You can have an Aspect as a second commander.)

card.name: Taking a Peek
card.text: Demonstrate. (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it.) Scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: Otterly Adorable
card.text: Create a 1/1 blue and red Otter creature token with prowess. Scry 1

card.name: Lost in the Pages
card.text: Remove up to one lore counters from target permanent you control, then put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Regrow the Wilds
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Blazing Glory
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may discard a card. Blazing Glory deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If the additional cost was paid, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Lomme, Ghost Shot
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. At the beginning of each end step, if you have cast a noncreature spell, you draw a card.

card.name: Hilm of the Pack
card.text: Devour 2 (As this enters, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, create X 3/3 green Beast creature tokens, where X is the number of cards in target opponent's hand minus 3.

card.name: Asin of the Pack
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, starting with you, each player votes for pack or plant. If pack gets more votes, create a 4/4 blue Beast creature token. If plant gets more votes or the vote is tied, create two 1/2 green Plant creature tokens.

card.name: Quest for the Throne
card.text: I, II — You may play an additional land this turn. III — Search your library for a land, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Becoming the Hero
card.text: I, II — Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens. III — Token creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: History of a Hero
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after you draw step, add a lore counter.) I, II — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains trample until end of turn. III — Exile this Saga then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control. --- (Back): Young Hero, Yalin

card.name: Young Hero, Yalin
card.text: Trample During your turn, this creature has first strike. --- (Front): History of a Hero

card.name: The Castle's Keep
card.text: I, II — Create a 1/1 white and blue Owl creature token with flying and prowess. III — Creatures you control gain prowess until end of turn. (If a creature has multiple instances of prowess, each triggers separately.)

card.name: Wimex Beast
card.text: Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may draw a card. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put up to one +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Wicha Inkmore
card.text: If you would mill one or more cards, you mill that many plus 2 instead. At the beginning of end step, create X 1/1 black Snake creature tokens, where X is the number of cards milled this turn. {2}, {T}: Mill two cards.

card.name: Whirl Agent
card.text: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

card.name: Baroness Faum
card.text: When Baroness Faum enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature tokens with flying. {2}: Target noncreature artifact becomes a 1/1 Monk artifact creature with melee. (Whenever that creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

card.name: Original Reflection
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it's a 2/2 blue Spirit.

card.name: Forest Pathways
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's first main phase, they may have you draw a card. If they do they add {G}{G}. At the beginning of your first main phase add {G}{G}.

card.name: Nature Sprites
card.text: {T}, Mill a card: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast Wizard or Spirit spells. (To mill a cards, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

card.name: Among the Tides
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard one card. Untap up to two lands.

card.name: The Sun Disc
card.text: When The Sun Disc enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until The Sun Disc leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Whirlpool Mage
card.text: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, create a 1/1 red and blue Otter creature token with prowess.

card.name: Bladed Traveler
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) When Bladed Traveler enters the battlefield, if it was bargained, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with deathtouch.

card.name: Market Traveler
card.text: When Market Traveler enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library, you may play that card for as long as it remains exiled.
